title: Big Christmas - Toy giveaway!!!
desc: Come out to this event for the ENTIRE family! Centered around the needs and wants of children, this event strives to encompass everything that kids love from arts and craft activities to facepainting to SANTA! Brought to you by Spreading the Gospel, a local church group on a mission to spread love and cheer, you can guarantee that this event will be grounded in Christian roots with a wholesome approach. Children will enjoy: Face Painting Fun Activities (clay molding, arts & crafts Contests (Miss Christian Contest) Children's award ?show & More!!!
